mapper.sql: date_one, date_two, date_three, date_four, date_five, date_six
mapper.insert: insert into date_table (date_one, date_two, date_three, date_four, date_five, date_six) values (#{dateOne}, #{dateTwo}, #{dateThree}, #{dateFour}, #{dateFive}, #{dateSix})
mapper.select: select date_one, date_two, date_three, date_four, date_five, date_six from date_table where id = #{id}
